title: You'll love where you live! Come home to Edge at Traverse Pointe
neighborhood: Henderson - 15 Minute Drive to Wetlands Park Nature Preserve
posting_body: ['Edge at Traverse Pointe', 'Address:', '1131 Wigwam Henderson, NV 89074', 'Bedrooms:', '1 |', 'Baths:', '1 |', 'Sq.', 'Footage:', '643 sq ft |', 'Pricing:', '$1525 - $2425/Month', 'Terms:', '3-Month, 4-Month, 5-Month, 6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month', 'show contact info', '+ + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + +', 'Features in this apartment home:', '✓ Air Conditioning/Heating', '✓ Ceiling Fans', '✓ Dining Room', '✓ Dishwasher', '✓ Linen Closet', '✓ Pantry', '✓ Range', '✓ Refrigerator/Ice Maker/Freezer', '✓ Tub/Shower', '✓ Window Coverings', '✓ Dark Cherry Cabinetry', '✓ Double Vanities', '✓ Granite Countertops', '✓ Hue Lighting', '✓ Instant Hot Water', '✓ Stainless Steel Appliances', '✓ Walk-In Closets', '✓ Washer/Dryer', '✓ Wheelchair Accessible (Rooms)', '✓ Wood Inspired Flooring', '+ + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + +', 'Amenities at our property:', '✓ Assigned Parking', '✓ Common Area Wi-Fi', '✓ Door-to-Door Trash Pickup', '✓ Garage(s)', '✓ Online Leasing', '✓ On-Line Payments', '✓ Onsite Maintenance', '✓ On-Site Management', '✓ Package Service', '✓ Pet Exercise Park', '✓ Pet Washing Station', '✓ Smoke Free', '✓ 24/7 Fitness Center with Towel & Water Service', '✓ Cabana', '✓ Electric Car Charging Stations', '✓ E-Lounge with Wi-Fi', '✓ Green Globes Certified', '✓ No Security Deposit Required OAC', '✓ Package Receiving', '✓ Self-Guided Tours', '✓ Smoke-Free Community', '✓ Sundeck and Outdoor Lounging Area', '✓ Two Pools and a Hot Tub/Spa', '+ + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + +', 'About the community:', 'Part of the Your Tour, Your Way? program.', 'It?s your apartment', 'and you are welcome to tour in a way that makes you feel most at home.', 'Whether you prefer to take a self-guided tour on your own, be accompanied by one of our leasing professionals or take a live video tour from the comfort of your home, we have options that will work for you!', 'Pets:', 'For complete Breed Restrictions, please see the Important Links section on our website.', 'The Edge at Traverse Pointe Apartments is a pet friendly community.', 'We allow two (2) pets max per household.', 'Monthly pet rent is $35 for one (1) pet and $60 for two (2) pets.', 'As well as a one time non-refundable pet fee for $300 for one (1) pet and $500 non-refundable pet fee for two (2) pets.', 'Phone:', 'show contact info', 'Mon - Fri: 8:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat - Sun: 8:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Management:', 'Security Properties', '*Prices are subject to change without notice', 'Availability and pricing are subject to change without notice.', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'SPRCL88', 'B130C20098714BF']
